messages.message:
That’s a very cool idea. Looks like they’ve hard-coded to Claude for now, but very excited if they give an option to use to OpenAI.

The runner code (aka where the magic happens) is pretty straight-forward — very interesting read:
https://github.com/anti-work/shortest/blob/main/packages/shortest/src/core/runner/index.ts#L178
https://github.com/anti-work/shortest/blob/main/packages/shortest/src/ai/client.ts#L67
